abstract.t: This draft describes the interface to the Telnet server on IBM's iSeries line of midrange business computers. This interface allows Telnet clients to request a Telnet terminal or printer session using specific session attributes related to device names, encryption, lan- guage support, auto-signon, response codes, session association, etc. These support functions are implemented primarily using the Telnet Environment option negotiation [RFC1572] to define new USERVAR vari- ables that will be recognized by iSeries Telnet server.
